mod_auth_digest.patch

I found, 2.2 mod_auth_digest have broken shared mem (nonce) code. 2.3 mod_auth_digest looks too rewritten to compare. I can not now describe problems - I fix & forget ;) at 2011-03, then I just post working patch. It works for me.

Sorry for big timeout...
